events.message: Received the application from candidate John Doe for the Software Engineer position, including his updated resume and cover letter demonstrating strong experience in backend development.
Categorized John Doe's application under Engineering due to his background and keywords related to software development and cloud infrastructure expertise.
Assigned recruiter Sarah Mitchell to John Doe's profile for further handling of the hiring process for the Software Engineer role.
Conducted the initial phone screening with John Doe to evaluate his technical background and cultural fit for the software engineering team.
Received John Doe's confirmation to proceed to technical interviews, and he expressed enthusiasm about the opportunity and the companyâ€™s product.
Scheduled the technical interview for John Doe on May 16th at 10 AM with the lead developer to assess coding skills and problem-solving abilities.
